author: COMSOL
description:
This model demonstrates how to set up a Time to Frequency FFT study for a distributed Bragg reflector (DBR) structure. A modulated Gaussian input pulse excites the DBR structure. The time-domain solution is subsequently transformed to the frequency domain, using a fast Fourier transform (FFT).

The results agree well with the results of a regular Frequency domain study.
label: time_to_frequency_fft_distributed_bragg_reflector.mph
